snippet.title: Next Player Please - Patreon trailer
snippet.description:
Next Player Please is the first fun and engaging VR party game played around a table with friends and only one device that is passed around the table.

In quick tournaments the players are pitched against one another to win the trophy over various mini games, whether it be fishing, sheep shearing, sling-shooting down built fortresses of your friends, or the good old hot potato with an explosive twist. Taking ideas from analog games Next Player Please transfers them into the digital realm making them more interactive, more personal, more multimedia. The result is the best of both board and video games. 

Next Player Please leverages the lightness of the Oculus Quest headset that can quickly be shared. It takes advantage of shared spaces and the quality of social play, bringing fun and easy to learn game modes in VR without the need for multiple devices or a fixed playspace. The game-modes thrive through social interaction and banter in a friendly setting around the coffee-, or the dinner-table.
